entity

Class Movie

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Movie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Movie
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a movie. Contains Review and ShowTime lists. Used to query a movie's show time and review
    Author:
    Group5
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Movie

        public Movie(int movieId,
             java.lang.String title,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> cast,
             java.lang.String director,
             java.lang.String language,
             java.lang.String synopsis,
             int runningTime,
             java.util.List<Review> reviews,
             java.lang.String movieType,
             java.lang.String rating,
             java.util.List<ShowTime> showTimes,
             java.lang.String status)
        This constructs a movie object with following details
        Parameters:
        movieId - The ID of this movie
        title - The movie's title
        cast - The list of casts
        director - The director
        language - The language this movie is in
        synopsis - The brief summary of this movie
        runningTime - The running time in minute
        overallUserRate - The overall user rating
        reviews - The list of reviews for this movie
        movie - Type The movie type
        rating - The restrict level
        showTimes - The list of show time
        status - The showing status of this movie
